svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Number of successful and unsuccessful terrorist attacks, World
Attacks that were attempted, denoted in terms of whether they were 'successful' or 'unsuccessful'. This assessment is
case-specific but largely relates whether or not the attack took place as planned. In general if a bomb is planted but
fails to detonate; if an arsonist is intercepted by authorities before igniting a fire; or, if an assassin attempts and fails
to kill his or her intended target, the attack is considered as unsuccessful. Note this does not include planned attacks
